name: Paul Marr
overview: Welcome to Paul Marr. You can look at a selection of our best-selling products and order either online, or email. You can buy unusual and beautiful things, especially Water colour orginal hand made greeting cards and prints,Straw paintings, Wood carvings, Vetiver(Ramacham) products, Oil Paintings, Eco friendly products etc. we can provide our customers with a good quality and supply. All of our products are handmade, usually by small groups of artisans or individuals. We provide a constant demand, pay reliably, and trade in an ethical way. We also encourage our suppliers to improve their own situation by offering higher prices for improvements in quality, a nd in general making their product more appealing to developed markets. We are big supporters of traditionally made handicrafts. Visit us on http://www.paulmarr.co.uk/
